DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain 1 dexterity this turn only.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
Resource used to trigger extra effects. At #b40 #yMemberships, summon a #yLUMA #yFumo.
Whenever an enemy with #yTalisman gets unblocked damage, loses HP equal to #yTalisman. At #b15+ #yTalisman at the end of turn, remove #yTalisman and lose HP equal to #yTalisman removed.
Modify #yLumo(s) intention. This will disappear at the start of your turn.
